resources.string: The information you will provide will help us know you better and tailor the app experience just for you!
You spend most of the day sitting!
You are on your feet most of the day!
You are extremely active most of the day!

Track your weight, activity, water and food calories to meet your health goals and make fitness fun! \n Aham Svastha* helps you be fit and healthy in the busy-driven world by retreating to the golden-olden, Yoga, and eating healthy food while performing exercises and drinking sufficient water!
Exercise is important and we are here to detect you exercise!
It\'s time to drink some water! Go and have a glass!
